querySql: select  t3.FNUMBER  as COMPANY_CODE, t3.FName_l2 as COMPANY_NAME, t4.FNUMBER as ORG_CODE, t4.FName_l2 as ORG_NAME, t1.FNUMBER as GATHERING_NO, t1.FBIZDATE as PAYEE_DATE, t5.FNUMBER as PAYEE_CATEGORY, t5.FName_l2 as PAYEE_CATEGORY_NAME, t6.Fnumber as CUSTOMER_CODE, t6.FName_l2 as CUSTOMER_NAME, t7.Fnumber as SUPPLIER_CODE, t7.FName_l2 as SUPPLIER_NAME, t8.FNumber as RECEIVABLES_TYPE, t8.FName_l2 as AMT_DESC, t9.FNumber as PAY_TYPE, t9.FName_l2 as PAY_TYPE_NAME, t10.Fnumber as CURRENCY_CODE, t10.FName_l2 as CURRENCY_NAME, t1.FActRecAmt as PAYEE_AMT, t1.FExchangeRate as RMB_RATE, t11.FNumber as DEPOSIT_ACCOUNT_RECEIVING_BANK, t11.FLONGNAME_L2 as RECEIVABLES, t12.Fnumber as RECEIVABLES_ACCOUNT_CODE, t12.Fname_l2 as RECEIVABLES_ACCOUNT_NAME, t13.Fnumber as PAYEE_TYPE, t13.Fname_l2 as PAYEE_TYPE_NAME, t14.Fnumber as BUSINESS_TYPE, t14.Fname_l2 as BUSINESS_TYPE_NAME, t15.Fnumber as PEYEE_ACCOUNT_LABEL, t15.Fname_l2 as PAYEE_BANK_ADDRESS, t1.FSettlementNumber as SETTLEMENT_NO, t1.FPayerAccountNumber as PAY_BANK_ADDRESS, t1.FPayerAccountBank as PAY_COMPANY_CODE, t16.Fnumber as CREATED_BY_CODE, t16.Fname_l2 as CREATED_BY, t1.FDESCRIPTION as REMARK, t1.FBillStatus as PAYEE_STATUS, t17.Fnumber as ENTRY_COLLECTION_TYPE, t17.Fname_l2 as ENTRY_COLLECTION_TYPE_NAME, t2.FAmount as PAYEE_AMT_ITEM, t2.FLocalAmount as PAYEE_AMT_BASE, t2.FRebate as DISCOUNT, t2.FRebateLocAmt as BASE_DISCOUNT, t2.FActualAmt as ACTUAL_PAYMENT, t2.FActualLocAmt as ACTUAL_PAYMENT_BASE, t2.FRemark as REMARK_A, t2.FProjectID as ITEM_NO, t2.FTrackNumber as TRACKING_NO, t2.FContractNumber as CONTRACT_NO from T_CAS_ReceivingBill t1 inner join T_CAS_ReceivingBillEntry t2 on t1.Fid = t2.FRECEIVINGBILLID left join T_ORG_COMPANY t3 on t3.Fid = t1.FCOMPANYID left join T_ORG_Admin t4 on t4.Fid = t1.FADMINORGUNITID left join T_BD_AsstActType t5 on t5.Fid = t1.FPayerTypeID left join T_BD_CUSTOMER t6 on t6.Fid = t1.FPayerID left join T_BD_SUPPLIER t7 on t7.Fid = t1.FPayerID left join T_CAS_ReceivingBillType t8 on t8.fid = t1.FRecBillTypeID left join T_BD_PaymentType t9 on t9.Fid = t1.FPaymentTypeID left join T_BD_Currency t10 on t10.fid = t1.FCURRENCYID left join T_BD_AccountView t11 on t11.Fid = t1.FPayeeAccountID left join T_BD_AccountBanks t12 on t12.fid = t1.FPayeeAccountBankID left join T_BD_SettlementType t13 on t13.fid = t1.FSettlementTypeID left join T_FS_SettBizType t14 on t14.fid = t1.FBizTypeID left join T_BD_Bank t15 on t15.fid = t1.FPayeeBankID left join T_BD_PERSON t16 on t16.fid = t1.FPERSONID left join T_CAS_ReceivingBillType t17 on t17.fid = t2.FRecBillTypeID where t1.FLastUpdateTime >= TO_DATE('2019-10-01 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')  and t1.FLastUpdateTime < TO_DATE('2020-03-01 00:00:00','YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')  and t1.FBillStatus ='14' order by t1.FCOMPANYID,t1.FNUMBER  -----收款单查询sql
